column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Such a cute little spot for a sit down meal or a quick bite! I ordered a truffle mushroom flatbread
column4: and a chocolate chip walnut cookie. Nothing disappointed! The fried chicken was cooked perfectly and had a lot of flavor. The flatbread was delicious
column5: as well. The tart was really yummy and the flavors went together so well! I took the cookie home so I could warm it up and eat it with milk- I HIGHLY recommend. The cookie is good room temp
column6: but I always think desserts are better served warm and with a cold glass of milk.
